alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 2:05PM MDT until July 04 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... East central Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 205 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grayrocks Reservoir, or 10 miles northeast of Wheatland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Torrington, Guernsey, Lingle, Fort Laramie, Fort Laramie National Historic Site, Grayrocks Reservoir, Veteran, Chugcreek and Y-O Ranch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
